visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly average temperatures for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins and a styled background.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the title is styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 18px. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, with labels styled in a medium gray color and a font size of 12px. The y-axis is titled 'Temperature (°C)' with a medium gray color and a font size of 14px, and its labels are aligned to the left with a slight offset. The data series represents monthly average temperatures, with a custom color of tomato red (#FF6347). The chart includes additional configurations such as a bottom margin of 80 pixels and a light gray background color. The legend is enabled and styled with medium gray text and a font size of 12px.
